name: Guided Hand
text: Your deity blesses any strike you make with that deity’s favored weapon.
prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, Channel Smite, proficiency with your deity’s favored weapon.
benefit: With your deity’s favored weapon, you can use your Wisdom modifier instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier on attack rolls.
mythicText: Attacks made with your deity’s favored weapon are divinely inspired.
mythicBenefit: When making attacks with your deity’s favored weapon, you can add your Wisdom modifier instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier on damage rolls.
text_zh: 在你使用你的神祇的偏好武器时，你会获得神的祝福。
prerequisites_zh: 【引导能量】职业特性，导能打击，擅长你的神祇偏好武器。
benefit_zh: 当你使用偏好武器时，你在掷攻击骰时可以用你的感知修正代替力量或敏捷修正。
mythicText_zh: 当神祇的偏好武器在手中时，你就像受到了神的引导一般。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用你所信仰的神祇的偏好武器进行攻击时，你能够将你的感知调整值修正伤害检定，以此取代力量或敏捷调整值对伤害检定的修正。
